lines.text: The Rangers are holding a meeting with the municipality later today.
We'll talk about the preservation of the surrounding fauna and flora.
Grass-type Trainers always greet us Rangers with a smile. It's gratifying.
They recognize just how important our work is.
We have activities planned for the summer. We'll take the local kids to the woods and teach them about nature.
Some are very eager to start their Pok√©mon journey. Ranger field trips help them wait.
I need to talk to higher-ups about our uniforms.
The brambles keep scratching my thighs. I wish I had long pants.
